lender.occupational_info: I write code. lots and lots of code.

lender.name: Ward
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people help themselves. I think building developing economies is a very important step to alleviating poverty, and loaning capital is one part of doing this.
lender.occupational_info: Check out my website/blog for insight into my true love: personal finance & investing! Read it and grow wealthy. Feel free to comment on the blog with your personal finance questions.

lender.name: Ravi
lender.loan_because: What a wonderful idea Kiva is! It allows people to help people empower themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of sick people at Inova Fairfax Hospital in Northern Virginia. I help train medical students and residents.

lender.name: Chad
lender.loan_because: I believe that in doing so I can positively impact the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: Professionally, I work for a large research 1 university. I am also a PhD student working on my dissertation in higher education.
